'''0.8.1''' is a [[launcher]] version released on May 21, 2013.

== Changes ==

* Client window now uses crafting table icon for main window when a snapshot build is selected.
** Launcher window still uses grass block icon 
** Selecting release builds on Windows currently uses the basic Java icon
